entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -24.3°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 79 %

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023
